ResourceHeader.ResourceName: ACE Solar Wind Electron, Proton, and Alpha Monitor (SWEPAM) Plasma Moments, Preliminary Values, Key Parameter (K0), 5 min Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Last known prior metadata Release Date

ACE: Updated to SPASE Version 2.4.0, three InformationURL URLs updated, revised by LFB on 2022-05-17

Updated PublishedBy name to match ROR Registry. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB
Added MetadataRightsList and RightsList(s). Updated to 2.7.1. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: The ACE Browse Data are designed for monitoring large-scale Particle and Field Behavior and for selecting interesting Time Periods. The Data are automatically generated from the Spacecraft Data Stream using simple Algorithms provided by the Instrument Teams. It is not routinely checked for Accuracy and is subject to revision. Use this Data at your own Risk, and consult with the appropriate Instrument Teams about citing it. These are SWEPAM Browse Data. These Data have not validated by the Experimenters and should not be used except for preliminary Examination prior to detailed Studies. SWEPAM - Solar Wind Electron Proton Alpha Monitor References: https://izw1.caltech.edu/ACE/.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: D.J. McComas, Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator, D.J. McComas, Southwest Research Institute.

PublicationInfo.Authors: McComas, D., Skoug, R., Delapp, D., Elliott, H., and Davis, A.

TimeSpan.Note: The Data become available about one Week after Observation

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time
Parameter.Caveats: Average Type: standard This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression.

Parameter.Name: Time PB5
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Time PB5, Time of Observation, Year, Day, and Milliseconds of Day
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind Proton Number Density
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Caveats: Np is the Solar Wind Proton Number Density in Units of cm^-3, as calculated by Integration of the Ion Distribution Function. These Data are Preliminary Values and are for Browse use only.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind Proton Bulk Speed
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Caveats: Vp is the Solar Wind Proton Speed, or more generally just the Solar wind Bulk Speed. It is obtained by Integration of the Ion (Proton) Distribution Function. These Data are Preliminary Values and are for Browse use only.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind Alpha Particle to Proton Density Ratio, Percentage
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Alpha Particle to Proton, He++/H+, Density Ratio, Percentage
Parameter.Caveats: He_ratio is the Ratio of the Number Density of Helium++ Ions to the Number Density of Protons. These Data are Preliminary Values and are for Browse use only.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind Proton Temperature, Radial
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Caveats: The Radial Component of the Proton Temperature is the (1,1) Component of the Temperature Tensor, along the Radial Direction. It is obtained by Integration of the Ion (Proton) Distribution Function. These Data are Preliminary Values and are for Browse use only.

Parameter.Name: Weight, Number of Measurements in Average
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Weight, Number of Measurements in Average for 5 min Data
